atham daruwanthula awadhanaya adukama,sithaeka aramunuka randawa ganiem apahasukama aadi manasika durwalatha nisa smarana hakiyawa adukamawida manew.kiyashili bawa adhika ha eya awama mattamaka athi daruwanthula ෙmabandu manasika dubalathabahulawa daknata laeb.102 smaraneydi wiwidha ayathula pawathina ෙwanaskam nisa yamak niwaradiwa smaranayawuwa yayisahimakata pathwiya ෙnohakibawa ෙpen.smarana kiyawaliyata ෙnoeyak ෙhethu nisa badha athi wiyahakiya.eෙsema smarana kiyawaliya wadath thiwa karawana ෙd athiwiya hakiya.yam smaranayakata wadapabala pathiwierodhi smaranayak mangin mul smarana hakiyawa aduwi yahakiya.yam smaranayakata wadapabala samana smaranayak mangin mul smarana hakiyawa thiwawi yahakiya.smarana adala pudgalayatabalapana swarupaya anuwa eewa pathijananathmaka ෙho pathieshedhanathmaka dayi thiranaya ෙker.ehidiadala pudgalaya kamathi,ruchikarana smarana pathijananathmaka ෙlasa thirana ෙker.eෙsema akamathi,aruchikarana smarana pathieshedhananathmaka ෙlasa thiranaya ෙker.nidasunak ෙse yam pudgaleyakutasiya maweg piyaeg wieyowa ෙwdanawaki.ebawin eya pathieshedhananathmaka smaranayakayi ෙker.eෙsema thama ihala wibhagayakin samathwima,ihala thanathurak athi rakiyawak labima wani ෙhethu sithatasathutak pemodayak athiwana awasthaya.ebawin ebandu ෙd pathijananathmaka smarana ෙse salek.minisunta wadath ෙwdanakari ha pemodaya athiwu awastha pahasuewan mathakey thanpathew.ebanduawastha pathijanathmaka ෙho pathieshedhanathmaka ෙho wiyahakiya.pathijanathmaka smarana nisa sithasathutin pier.pathieshedhanathmaka smarana nisa sitha dukin pier.pathieshedhanathmaka smarana manasataathiwanuey pidawaki.aathathiyaki.ebawin ebandu smarana yaliyali smruthiyata nangima nisa manasikawaada watiyahakiya.atham awasthawaladi ෙm thathwa wardhanayawima wishadaya (
